Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The number of defects per unit of measurement (e.g., per thousand units).
The percentage of products that meet quality standards without rework.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Number of Units Passing Inspection on First Attempt / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The percentage of identified issues that have had corrective actions implemented.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Number of Corrective Actions Implemented / Total Number of Corrective Actions) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The percentage of the total production that undergoes inspection.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Number of Units Inspected / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The rate of complaints received from customers.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Number of Customer Complaints / Total Units Sold) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The total cost associated with ensuring products meet quality standards, including prevention, appraisal, and failure costs.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Cost of Quality-Related Activities / Total Production Cost) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.EXPLANATION: The score reflecting the quality of products supplied by vendors.
The percentage of products or processes that do not conform to specifications.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Quality Cont.FORMULA: (Number of Non-Conforming Units / Total Units Produced) * 100
